website_summaries.verdict: This hose coils inside an encased wheel eliminates the need to drag your hose back for storage.
pros: Device retracts the hose with a pull and roll, doing the work so you don't have to
Lasts for several years without leaks
Plastic enclosure works well and as intended
After sturdy installation, this hose is easy to use
cons: At 30 pounds, this model is quite heavy

customer_reviews.title: I had purchased this item thru Amazon in May, ...
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased this item thru Amazon in May, 2018. Today, two months later the hose has a big rip and the water is coming out. Trying to contact Asurion as I had taken a warranty thru them. Asurion says it is still under manufacturers warranty. Trying to look online all over for a contact no for Gardena Hose and there is no number. Can Amazon help me get this hose replaced. Please contact me on my email or cell. bestmom1216@aol.com (714)337-1588 Thanks. sandy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unresponsive Customer Service Makes Warranty Worthless
customer_reviews.text: I love the hose, but the connections that came with it started leaking after the first year. It's under a two year warranty so these parts should be covered. I've emailed the customer service folks twice and left a VM with one of their customer service representatives because no one was picking up the phone. I need a new end hose water stop connector and adapter because whenever it's connected, the hose leaks. They should stand behind their product at such a high cost and incessant talking points about their engineering and manufacturing prowess.
customer_reviews.author: B. Pa2

customer_reviews.title: not for those who don't do construction
customer_reviews.text: I don't work in the construction industry and I'm just a normal guy (like an accountant). I put together a lot of furniture by IKEA, Weber grills, etc. etc. and it's pretty easy for me. But I failed at the mounting. The plastic thing that you put into the drilled hole in masonry and the screws it came with didn't go all the way in. I think it's because it was slanted going in etc. But I don't want to drill even more holes in my house to fix the mistake and now I just have this $250 hose that I can't use and holes in my house. If you don't know construction, better stick with a non-mount option.
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Best Hose Reel Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This hose reel out performs my expectations which were high! Fairly easy to install. I used all thread through a cinder block wall. Easy to stretch out full length to 80 feet, easy to twist on and adjust water flow. Just tug and it retracts on its own. Reel pivots 180 degrees. Love the quick release fittings, just like air hoses. Simple to remove reel head to put on another wall bracket or to store inside for the winter. The mounting instructions could be a little bit better.
customer_reviews.author: Phils2888

customer_reviews.title: A Truly expensive item, but poorly made
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd one I have purchased and the first one lasted two days and this one lasted just about one year. A very dangerous item if the hose pulls out like the last one did. My hand got caught in it and was able to get it out. Had to call for help and tore part of my hand off when removed. I do not recommend this product or any from the company. Customer service never called me back after three attempts and emails. POOR, POOR customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not last...
customer_reviews.text: I'm so freaking disappointed in this hose! I paid extra for what I thought was a superior product only to have the spring wind out after less than two years of use and taking in inside for the winters. I paid way too much for a retractable garden hose to have it only last a year. I didn't even use it all that often. Not impressed with Gardena right now at all.
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: The manufacturer stands behind their product!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the unit, the unit has a 5-year warranty. The traversing mechanism failed after 1-year and hose did not coil correctly. Contacted Gardena in Canada, the North American distributor, sent a few pictures of the unit and a replacement arrived within 5-days. Others have stated couldn't find help. 800-792-9331 talk to John Irvine if you have a problem with the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Actually works really well!
customer_reviews.text: We had Sharper Image retractable hoses that eventually failed after a couple of years of use before buying this Gardena product. The Gardena is superior in every way ~ it was not hard to set up and the retractable hose works really well. My only gripe would be the nozzle, which will occasionally come loose at the connection and spray water on me. I am going to replace it with a different one, but I would highly recommend this sturdy, reliable retractable hose.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia F. Kaiser

customer_reviews.title: Well made, perfect for car guys
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure most folks buy this for their gardens but I mounted this on the ceiling of my garage and tapped into the water line so I could use it to wash my cars. Works awesome! The hose is lightweight which is nice. I was planning on buying a better nozzle but the one included actually works great and it very light. Hopefully it lasts the test of time.
customer_reviews.author: BimmerGuy

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding retracting house reel
customer_reviews.text: I have four of these, in three sizes, and the whole family loves them. Rewinding the house, even after pulling out the full length, is as easy as giving the house a quick pull to unlock, then just walking the house and back to the reel. (You can let it go and it won’t accelerate to crazy speeds, but your spray nozzle would be pulled across the ground and might take some damage. )
customer_reviews.author: Clemens

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this retractable water hose....Quality built, looks good, works as advertised and I have another one on the way, only shorter, for a different area of usage and I will be buying 2 more!....
customer_reviews.author: Victor O. Shumate

customer_reviews.title: Worth a ZERO
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely the worst quality I have experienced. The retract stopped working in two days.
customer_reviews.author: NorwayNick

customer_reviews.title: Great investment!
customer_reviews.text: We love using the newly installed Gardena hose and it is a HUGE improvement on the reel we used before. We did suspend the new reel on a sturdy, weather resistant, 4x4 that was set in quickset concrete (very easy to do and just fill the hole with water and pour the concrete in. No need to mix etc!). We used sink plates that are typically used for house construction that fit perfectly on the post.
customer_reviews.author: Hotyogagirl

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly well built
customer_reviews.text: This thing is built as nice as it looks in the photos. Comes WITH a nozzle so don't order one like I did. My only complaint is the water pressure is a little lower than the 5/8" hose I was using before. I still would buy this, but just know your pressure might be bumped down just a bit.
customer_reviews.author: A customer

customer_reviews.title: beware cheap plastic hose guide inside unit see pictures
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product and received broken reel guides within the unit -TWICE ! The internal guide is made of plastic and is cheap construction for the price you pay - I switched to another product
customer_reviews.author: MDT

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty, Well Made
customer_reviews.text: have had this for a few months. got it for my 70 year old mother who broke both wrists a couple of years ago & doesn't have a lot of strength. this replaced a 100 ft hose reel. It is great! now she can water her plants to her hearts content. it is well made, easy to install & is holding up to daily usage for a few months now. I would expect this to last years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonaholic

customer_reviews.title: FORTUNATELY, the amazing Amazon community helped me solve my ...
customer_reviews.text: Mounted well on brick. Had an issue but could not contact anyone with Gardena for help. FORTUNATELY, the amazing Amazon community helped me solve my problem. (Thank you so much RW!) Worls great now. It was totally user error from me. Product is working great.
customer_reviews.author: Tim D.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves this thing. We love how it self retracts. Even with the hose full of water it still winds itself up. The mounting of the real is easy. Instructions are simple and straightforward. Remove one screw and it easily comes out of its holder for winter storage or to move to a different location around the house. Just installed so durability will come in time.
customer_reviews.author: Richard M. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great product that lasts
customer_reviews.text: Does as advertised. I've had one unit for 4 years and another for a year without issue, except for the plastic hand tightened sprayer quick disconnect. I suggest using Gardena's higher quality metal version for durability.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, No response from Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these, as they are very handy with the cleanup of your garden hose... I did have an inner belt that broke on my 2nd unit, 3 months into ownership. I emailed the company 2x with no answer from them... I am still currently seeking a replacement part which has me frustrated. Otherwise, we still really enjoy our 1st hose reel that is currently still working.
customer_reviews.author: bgamazon

customer_reviews.title: No leaky hose at connection point!  Hose retracts into housing - LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this hose reel. Best one I ever got. You just snap on the spray gun or sprinkler and no leaking at the connection like so many regular hoses that you have to screw the spray gun onto. Love the self retracting back into the housing. Totally worth the money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jill L. Dehmer

customer_reviews.title: Works well & seems well built
customer_reviews.text: My wife & I love this hose reel! It pulls out & retracts easily. I have used several water powered hose reels in the past and they are cheaply made and usually quit working after 2 seasons or so. This unit seems well built and I hope it will last a long time. Pulls out & retracts much faster than water powered units. I am ordering a second one now for my front yard. Only downside is that they are expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Sunfixer

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. The design is great. I had one problem with water leaking from the center hub, so I returned it to Amazon and ahoy another one which also leaked. The service center in Ontario said this has been an issue with some units in the US, but put me in touch with headquarters in Germany and they were awesome. I agreed to replace the seals in the hub if they sent me the parts. It still leaks a few drops in cool weather but not a deal breaker to me.
customer_reviews.author: Steve-o

customer_reviews.title: It does work but does not put a lot of pressure.
customer_reviews.text: Since it is all plastic, it does not tights to faucet and it leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Armando A. Suarez

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality product - not worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: I am sorry but a product of this price/quality should last more than a year. After a light use over 2 summers, plastic pieces managing the hose retraction at the front fell apart and the whole unit is useless at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have had this for a year and I love the convenience but the small hose size is limiting ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for a year and I love the convenience but the small hose size is limiting and time consuming. Takes almot twice as long to water as with my larger hose of old. I would not recommend this product for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: nniknnak

customer_reviews.title: Well made. One small problem.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. But they don't tell you that you need a special screw driver to separate the hose from the mounting base so you can mount it. I had the bit but if I didn't I would be annoyed. The instructions don't mention how to separate the two so I had to call the company in Canada b
customer_reviews.author: Pat McGoin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent kink free hose
customer_reviews.text: Excellent kink free hose. Quality construction. Pull to retract functionality is reliable, and easy to trigger. Everyone who has used it, ends up wanting one.
customer_reviews.author: JamesDM

customer_reviews.title: Great hose reel!
customer_reviews.text: Best hose reel I've ever used. After installing this, my wife and I actually don't mind going outside to water the plants. Very well constructed and the self-retraction works great every time. No more fumbling around with a traditional hose. I only wish the connectors were metal instead of plastic.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisGeek

customer_reviews.title: The product is broken after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Hello.. The product was very good for 4 months..after 4 months the base broken and I can't use the product..so I paid a lot of money for something that doesn't work. I don't know what to do?
customer_reviews.author: Azyoss

customer_reviews.title: Great hose reel
customer_reviews.text: Love this hose reel. I have had it almost a year now and it still works flawlessly. Heavy duty, winds hose back perfectly every time. No problems at all. It was easy to remove from the holder and store for winter.
customer_reviews.author: DZrad

customer_reviews.title: yard flooded two times
customer_reviews.text: Although I love the convenience of this hose reel, i do not like the fact you have to use their parts to attach a nozzle. But what's worse is when you use their parts, they separate easily from the hose. When this happens, it results in a flooded yard. This happened to me TWO times. Now I am afraid to leave the water on.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Love this hose system
customer_reviews.text: This hose system is just plain great. We have installed it on the corner of our deck (with a connector hose running from our spigot to this product's input) and it is now so much easier to bring the hose around the yard to water. The retractable hose mechanism works perfectly and you don't need to handle much of the hose itself, saving your hands from getting dirty. We love this thing and wish we'd purchased it years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Dusty

customer_reviews.title: Garden hose
customer_reviews.text: I received this on June 5, this past summer. Worked great for awhile, now on Oct 14, it stopped retracting. It appears I'm not eligible to return it. I already have it mounted on the house per my handyman, it would be a major job to remove it and pack it to send back anyway. I will go back to the wind up hose. I can't recommend this product at all. It's too expensive to work for only 4 months.
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie Cox

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY - VERY POOR QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this product but it is completely unusable. The hose does not stay in the grip and it and it just pops out with the force of the water. Waste of money. Worst part. It's two days past the return date so I am stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Matalas

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality and a very expensive mistake
customer_reviews.text: This retractable reel that guides the hose retraction broke off after just two uses. Unfortunately, it is after 30 days. Contacted and emailed Gardena with photo of the broken part. The service person said to "we will be in touch tomorrow". However, after repeated email and many days/week, no reply. Very poor quality and a very expensive mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best hose reel ever!
customer_reviews.text: Why did it take me so long to purchase one of these? So easy to use, easy retraction, quality hose, quick installation
customer_reviews.author: Memphis

customer_reviews.title: Good for people with arthritis.
customer_reviews.text: All is good so far. It is everything they detail in the listing. My reason for 3 stars for stuffiness is the plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Imlach

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Makes for easy watering and putting hose away when I’m done.
customer_reviews.author: Owen Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Well designed and built
customer_reviews.text: Only had one season, time will tell. I really like how easy it is to pull and retract.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Santella

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this product
customer_reviews.text: The product worked well for 18 months and then the locking device stopped working making it useless. I would not recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Paul P

customer_reviews.title: bought 3 2-85ft 1-115ft
customer_reviews.text: easy to use, look solid, portable to stock away for the winter, and no back pain.
customer_reviews.author: S3XY

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works beautifully and is an amazing convenience. I'd buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Handley

customer_reviews.title: this will be good if it not breaking
customer_reviews.text: Very expensive and it break we bought 2 and the other one did the same
customer_reviews.author: dodo

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked at the quality. This is exactly what we wanted and needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Knowlden

customer_reviews.title: This is the game changer!!!!!!'n
customer_reviews.text: This hose amazing. No more struggling winding up the hose after I water my flowers. The retraction is unbelievable. I do use a towel to wipe off any access dirt as it slides through my hands. The only thing is you will want to pull out about as much hose as you are going to need before you begin because it is hard to do. You can roll this thing up with the water still turned on. This is a true game changer for me struggling with hoses in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great concept and overall functionality
customer_reviews.text: great concept and overall functionality, aside for the hose connection to the water head. The fastener just does not work well and hose keeps blowing out under water pressure. More frustrating is only the lack of a timely response and assistance from Gardena customer service.
customer_reviews.author: VRinSLC

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality. I’ve used it for about a month now and I love it. Easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Marianne H

customer_reviews.title: This is one of purchases that keeps making you happy. Even though it is expensive
customer_reviews.text: This is one of purchases that keeps making you happy. Even though it is expensive, it is worth it. I mounted it inside our garden shed. It is so easy to pull out and retract that I never have the hose just laying around the garden anymore. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Mark E.

customer_reviews.title: Great company
customer_reviews.text: I like all their products. This hose and retract are great. A little expensive but, for me, well worth it. Try their sprinklers and hand sets too. Their just as good.
customer_reviews.author: gshacienda

customer_reviews.title: Like the Retract - hose fittings not so much
customer_reviews.text: Really like the retract feature. Works well so far. Hose fittings however are problematic. Have had end that connect to hose bib blow out during use. Had other end come loose as well. Easy enough to "fix" but wonder if this will be a ongoing problem. Seems a bit on the pricey side.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Birr

customer_reviews.title: Quality Problems
customer_reviews.text: Real quality issues with this hose and the 35m one I bought as well. This one has a hose guide that wasn't attached properly and thus the hose does't lay down hose properly on the reel. The 35m worked for a week or two and then sprung a massive internal leak (inside the plastic box). At over $250 each, German made, I'm shocked that the company would let them off the assembly line like this. Glad that Amazon has a bullet-proof return process: exchanged for replacements and crossing my fingers those ones are better built.... Disappointed to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: EM Doc

customer_reviews.title: Ordered it and a spray nozzle and never recieved the unit.
customer_reviews.text: They seem confused and are impossible to get a hold of for warranty issues. This is my attempt at a second unit after I gave up on getting the first one repaired.
customer_reviews.author: William McElhaney

customer_reviews.title: Good product, make sure you have space!
customer_reviews.text: Very big and heavy, need good size area and space for mounting properly.
customer_reviews.author: Robert F.

customer_reviews.title: Strongly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Incredible, high quality product. Love it and I know others who have it and do also. Two thumbs up. No hose tangling or messy recoiling. Super easy, clean and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Ventura

customer_reviews.title: Stress free garden hose
customer_reviews.text: Have used Gardena in last home and got 2 for my current home. No more tangled hoses or dragging across gardens.
customer_reviews.author: john cathey

customer_reviews.title: Great hose reel.
customer_reviews.text: Love that I can water all my plants and the hose pulls back so easily.
customer_reviews.author: L. Flannery

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Finally a hose winder that actually works. Only two downsides: 1) The hose has a small diameter which limits the pressure. 2) I hate the plastic Gardena attachments, so I purchased a metal quick coneect adapter and used my own attachments. But, the rolls itself up beautifully everytime!!
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: this is the best so far
customer_reviews.text: I've tried every type of water-retracting hose reel so far... this is the best so far. Although you have slightly less pressure since the hose is 1/2", the convenience and design outweigh the negative.
customer_reviews.author: Safari John

customer_reviews.title: Very good hose reel!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, not cheap though but works well, looks great! Built a concrete post, so does not need to attached to house wall! Gardena is good quality in general and polymers are up stable. So far very happy!
customer_reviews.author: minu

customer_reviews.title: Best Garden Equipment
customer_reviews.text: Easy to unroll and easier to roll back. The is the neatest garden hose/hose box I have ever seen. Before this device my garden hose was always laying on the grass, It was too difficult for me to roll hose back on the hose hanger. I highly recommend this device.
customer_reviews.author: D. Berger

customer_reviews.title: Extreamily convinient, and Durable.
customer_reviews.text: YES, it is a bit Pricy but it is worth it. We use it serval times a day. The very first one I own is about 9 years now and still working.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I inserted the hose about a good half inch into the connector and tightened it
customer_reviews.text: I'm only giving three stars because of the workmanship assembling this unit. The hoses are just barely inserted into the connectors. The hose connector with the nozzle came off in my hand, and I saw that the hose was crimped by the connector just on the very end. I inserted the hose about a good half inch into the connector and tightened it. No problem now. But do NOT handle (pull) the hose by the nozzle.The connector that attached to your water supply was the very same. I had to undo it and insert the hose properly and re-tighten. The rewind mechanism seems to be pretty heavy-duty. I'll write again after more use.
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: I like the accessibility to this product, and the durability of this product
customer_reviews.author: Alan J Kent

customer_reviews.title: A bit pricey, but worth it. Finally got ...
customer_reviews.text: A bit pricey, but worth it. Finally got fed up with previous hose reel and hose. Constant struggle. This really works as described.
customer_reviews.author: M. Stratton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Well made, easy assembly. Just hope the spring will hold up, until now all good.
customer_reviews.author: SickSadWorld

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best hose and worth the additional expense than some pieced together solution
customer_reviews.author: Travis Ringle

customer_reviews.title: the best hose I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: the best hose I have ever had. Just got it and mounted it - I love that it is long and it rolls itself back up. I got the longest one I could find. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Preston

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT HOSE IS VERY FLEXIBLE AND SOFT AND THE REWIND IS GREAT
customer_reviews.author: larry pottratz

customer_reviews.title: Love the product would just like if it came with ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the product would just like if it came with more quick attachments No issues however and it works great
customer_reviews.author: J M

customer_reviews.title: awesome hose real setup
customer_reviews.text: great quality and zero leaks at the connections. Easy to mount and use. It's bigger than expected and isn't cheap, but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: NRAmember

customer_reviews.title: The best one I have found
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, quite large. Pros: Well made, Heavy. Operates smoothly Water pressure not an issue light weight hose, easy to maneuver. Handle through package is "handy" Cons: Blue/green insert is too bright and does not blend into garden. Heavy weight may require an assistant for some. Light weight Hose may be prone to kinking, but has not yet Included nozzle only turns off when removed Instructions are a bit weak for a high end item. T-20 torx bit not included Note; for security the holder has a t-20 Torx screw securing it to the bracket. This screw needs to be removed to separate the hose holder from the wall bracket to mount the bracket.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Weiser

customer_reviews.title: nice looking hose reel
customer_reviews.text: nice looking hose reel, and as other reviewers said, yes the hose itself is not the greatest, but the convenience of the reel and the appearance of it make up for it.
customer_reviews.author: mellamia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it, wry easy to use and stores hose quickly back in place
customer_reviews.author: barbaraclement

customer_reviews.title: This was the perfect solution for our backyard
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect solution for our backyard. I used the wall mount and its up out of the way, but easy to access.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: High quality construction. I have two, they save my back and are fast.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Pirello

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but the amount of water coming out of this smaller hose is definitely less than a normal hose.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be pretty good quality, however in my opinion the price is way to high and the water pressure is definitely less than a normal size hose because the hose is smaller in diameter. The other reviewers that state differently on the water pressure are wrong and obviously have not done much yard work that involves watering with a hose or washing your car. One thing for sure, it's a lot nicer not having to wind or roll up the hose. The spring back works well, a lot like the way Mom's canister vacuum cord would spring back into her vacuum. The way the hose carrier/case swivels on your wall is a nice feature too.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Convenient. No more messy. I bought 2 one for front yard and one for my backyard.
customer_reviews.author: StreetWorkout

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Great product , not the first one I bought and will buy another
customer_reviews.author: Bob T.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and very sturdy feel. Will re-review after 6 months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Neil S. Kaye

customer_reviews.title: very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: My husband was surprised this included a hose, very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Worked just as advertised. SOme neat features and good German engineering.
customer_reviews.author: Surya

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: i bought 1...then 2,... then gave one to my friend ...love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great Father's Day gift.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Seems very durable. I love the retractable hose. I plan to order a second one for the front of the house.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie L

customer_reviews.title: ... had several auto rewind reels and this is the best to
customer_reviews.text: I have had several auto rewind reels and this is the best to date
customer_reviews.author: stephen bardfield

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: This product is sturdy and well built. I love that it swings 180 degrees and deploys and retracts easily. I could not however give it five stars. The pre-nozzle piece had a red or orange flap that got stuck in the closed position preventing water from coming out and had to be poked out. Otherwise I have no complaints. In fact I just ordered another one for the other side of my house.
customer_reviews.author: REELDOC

customer_reviews.title: The connection hose to the unit fell off and I ...
customer_reviews.text: The connection hose to the unit fell off and I can't get it back on. How do i return this item?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the best thing to eliminate the normal hose kinks and dirty ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing to eliminate the normal hose kinks and dirty hands while putting the hose back. I now have two of them on my house and love them.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne W.

customer_reviews.title: Great hose for elderly lightweight
customer_reviews.text: My customer love this hose reel the hose is so light she just loved it
customer_reviews.author: animalmaintenance

customer_reviews.title: Was more than I expected well made a little pricey ...
customer_reviews.text: Was more than I expected well made a little pricey but worth every bit the last three years bought less expensive ones and at end of the season was being trashed so hopefully this will not be the case I am enjoying it to the fullest bill k

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works very well so far. hope it lasts a while
customer_reviews.author: Paul Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Best of the Best
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE MY Gardena. Talk about easy to use and so wonderful to be able to have it auto rewind. I am ordering another one for the other side of my garden.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of the best
customer_reviews.text: I have had several varieties of these products. This is an excellent one.
customer_reviews.author: Chas SB

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Hose
customer_reviews.text: According to my husband, this is one of the best purchases we ever made for the house. In fact, I'm just about to place an order for our third unit for a different area of our property. The quality as well as the effortless, smooth, recoil of the hose on this unit is amazing. My son stopped by our house to water our plants while we were on vacation and he made a comment on the unit as well. Now he wants to get one for his house. Although they're quite pricey, we believe they were well worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: JEANNIE STELMACK

customer_reviews.title: Requires a Torx T-20 Driver for installation
customer_reviews.text: Which I have, but most purchasers will likely not. IMO. for $200, they ought to include a cheap stamped driver.
customer_reviews.author: Building Account

product_meta.title: GARDENA Retractable Hose Reel 82-Feet With Convenient Hose Guide
product_meta.description: GARDENA Swivel Wall-Mounted Automatic Hose Box 35 Roll-Up with Convenient Hose Guide. The hose can be conveniently withdrawn with little effort and stopped at short interval.
feature_bullets: With a short pull on the hose, the lock releases and the hose is drawn into the box-no bending over or cranking
An integrated steel spring provides even, powerful retraction; The integrated hose guide prevents twisting and tangling of the hose
Includes a Hose Guide bracket to mount on wall or corner mount; Nozzles, sprayers and wash brushes can be stored on the wall bracket, ready for use
In winter, the Hose Box can be taken by the ergonomically-shaped handle and effortlessly removed from the wall bracket for frost-protected storage
Hose diameter single 13 mm. Wall bracket, screws, wall plugs are all included
